entry.title: MySQL Crash Course / After reading
entry.content:
Remarks

  1. columnName = cN
  2. tableName = tN

æ£€ç´¢æ•°æ®

use / show

  • use databaseName;
  • show databases;
  • show tables;
  • show columns from tN;

select / distinct

  • select cN,cN2 from tN;
  • select * from tN;
  • select distinct cN from tN;

limit

  • select cN from tN limit 3; è¿”å›3è¡Œ
  • select cN from tN limit 3,4;è¿”å›ç¬¬3è¡Œåé¢çš„4è¡Œï¼ˆç¬¬ä¸€ä¸ªæ•°ä¸ºå¼€å§‹çš„ä½ç½®ï¼Œç¬¬äºŒä¸ªä¸ºè¦æ£€ç´¢çš„è¡Œæ•°ï¼‰

  • select tNX.cN from databaseName.tNX; å®Œå…¨é™å®šåˆ—åã€è¡¨å
  • select cN from tN order by cN; æŒ‰ç…§æŒ‡å®šåˆ—åæ’åº

  • select cN1,cN2 from tN order by cN2 desc limit 1;

è¿‡æ»¤æ•°æ®

  • select cN1,cN2 from tN where cN1 = 2;
  • select cN1,cN2 from tN where cN2 = 'value';

  • select cN1,cN2 from tN where cN1 between 3 and 10;
  • select cN1,cN2 from tN where cN2 is null; è¿”å› cN2 ä¸º ç©ºå€¼ çš„è¡Œ

and / or / ( ) / è¿ç®—ç¬¦

  • select cN1,cN2,cN3 from tN where cN1 = 2 and cN3 <= 19;
  • select cN1,cN2,cN3 from tN where cN1 = 2 or cN3 <= 19;
  • select cN1,cN2,cN3 from tN where cN1 = 2 or cN2 = 'value' and cN3 <= 19; andçš„ä¼˜å…ˆçº§é«˜äºor
  • è¿™å¥å°±ç†è§£ä¸º cN2 ç­‰äº value ä¸” cN3 å°äºï¼ˆå«ï¼‰19 æˆ–è€… cN1 = 2
  • cN1 = 2 or cN2 = â€˜valueâ€™ and cN3 <= 19
  • select cN1,cN2,cN3 from tN where (cN1 = 2 or cN2 = 'value') and cN3 <= 19; ç”¨æ‹¬å·æé«˜ä¼˜å…ˆçº§

in

  • select cN1,cN2 from tN where cN2 in ('value','value2');
  • select cN1,cN2 from tN where cN1 in (2,4,5);
  • in (4,5)ç­‰åŒäºcN1 = 4 or cN1 =5
  • ä¼˜ç‚¹ï¼šin æ›´ç›´è§‚æ–¹ä¾¿ï¼Œæ‰§è¡Œå¿«ï¼Œè¿˜å¯ä»¥åŒ…æ‹¬ where å­å¥

like / é€šé…ç¬¦

  • select cN1,cN2 from tN where cN2 like 'val%'; % è¡¨ç¤ºä»»ä½•å­—ç¬¦å‡ºç°ä»»æ„æ¬¡æ•°
  • select cN1,cN2 from tN where cN2 like '%al%'; % æ— æ³•åŒ¹é…åˆ° null

  • é€šé…ç¬¦å¤„ç†æ›´èŠ±æ—¶é—´ï¼Œå°½é‡ç”¨å…¶ä»–æ“ä½œç¬¦ï¼Œå°½é‡ä¸è¦æŠŠé€šé…ç¬¦ç”¨åœ¨æœç´¢æ¨¡å¼çš„å¼€å§‹å¤„ï¼Œå½±å“æ•ˆç‡

  • select cN1,cN2 from tN where cN1 regexp '1';
